amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds for Department of Energy Office of Science's Office of Scientific Workforce Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
